quest.name: Uma Viagem em Vão
quest.desc: O $map:02000328$ foi uma decepção, mas $npcName:11001116$ ouviu um boato que pode lhe interessar. Parece que $npcName:11000543$, que se encontra na $map:02000148$, viu alguém bastante suspeito.

quest.name: Um Relato dos Ermos
quest.desc: $npcName:11000543$ diz que, na verdade, ele ouviu de $npcName:11000533$ o boato sobre $npcName:11001108$. Siga para o centro da $map:02000148$ e faça uma visita a esse $npcName:11000533$.

quest.name: Troca de Serviços
quest.desc: O $npcName:11000533$ diz ter visto alguém igual ao $npcName:11001111$, mas não quer contar mais nada. Não sem antes receber algo em troca, pelo menos. É melhor você fazer o que ele quer.
quest.manual: Derrote os monstros na $map:02000148$ |Limpe os canos enferrujados na $map:02000148$

quest.name: Ao Seu Alcance
quest.desc: $npcName:11000533$ diz ter visto $npcName:11001111$ seguindo na direção do $map:02000139$. Se correr, você deve conseguir alcançá-lo.

quest.name: Siga Aquele Loiro
quest.desc:
Você correu pelas ruas do $map:02000139$ em perseguição a $npcName:11001111$. Por sorte, $npcName:11000173$, seu bom e velho amigo traiçoeiro estava lá para lhe dar uma pista.
$npcName:11003207$, no $map:02000138$, diz ter visto um cara loiro entrar no $map:52000125$.

quest.name: Uma Mentira por Omissão
quest.desc: O cara loiro no depósito era na verdade $npcName:11003206$, irmão mais novo de $npcName:11000211$. Pelo jeito, você foi $male:enganado,female:enganada$ a salvar $npcName:11003206$ de uma gangue de assaltantes.

quest.name: Uma Testemunha Confiável
quest.desc: $npcName:11003206$ alega ter realmente visto um homem loiro cuja aparência bate com a descrição de Lennon. Já que você salvou o irmão de $npcName:11003206$, é a vez dele ajudar. Procure $npcName:11000867$ no $map:02000138$.

quest.name: Em Troca de uma Lembrança
quest.desc: $npcName:11000867$ vive dizendo que nada acontece no $map:02000138$ sem que ele fique sabendo, mas mesmo assim não consegue lembrar para onde foi o homem loiro. Talvez você precise fazer algo para refrescar a memória dele.
quest.manual: Derrote os $npcNamePlural:21000015$, os $npcNamePlural:21000024$ e os $npcNamePlural:21000161$ no $map:02000138$

quest.name: Informação de um Mercador
quest.desc: Que conveniente $npcName:11000867$ ter lembrado para onde foi o homem loiro justamente depois que você o ajudou! Vá ao $map:52000126$.

quest.name: Lennon Perdido
quest.desc: O homem loiro no $map:52000126$ não era $npcName:11001111$, mas um $npcName:11000213$. Ele não parece bater muito bem da cabeça. Bem na hora em que está a prestes a desistir, você é $male:emboscado,female:emboscada$ por bandidos usando máscaras que não lhe são estranhas…

quest.name: O Aguardado Encontro
quest.desc: $npcName:11000211$ e $npcName:11003206$ localizaram o homem loiro como forma de agradecer a você. Sua busca leva você até a $map:52000046$.

quest.name: Vislumbre da Verdade
quest.desc: $npcName:11003215$ alega não ter matado $npcName:11003219$. Seja qual for o caso, você deve levar $npcName:11003215$ para ser interrogado.

quest.name: Verdade Escondida
quest.desc:
Você acordou no melhor hospital da Cidade de Kerning. Hoje não é o seu dia.
Volte para o escritório de comando no $map:02000153$ e conte as novidades para os outros.

quest.name: Reagrupar
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ foi muito compreensivo com seu fracasso em capturar $npcName:11003215$. Agora é hora de se reunir aos outros e traçar um novo plano. Vá até o piso térreo do $map:52000055$.

quest.name: Cogumelo Negro
quest.desc: Os radares estão detectando uma coisa estranha. Tem monstros invadindo a $map:02000100$! $npc:11000044$ está iniciando o Cogumelo Negro… seja lá o que for isso.

quest.name: Fim da Investigação
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ lhe agradece por salvar a $map:02000100$, mas ele não poderá lhe oferecer mais ajuda até que a cidade esteja em ordem novamente. É hora de voltar para $map:02000001$ e avisá-los sobre tudo que aconteceu.

quest.name: Choque após Choque
quest.desc:
A imperatriz está chocada com a morte de $npcName:11003219$, que era um dos Sete Heróis.
A conversa de vocês foi interrompida por um guarda que comunicou algo ao $npc:11001666$. Do que se trata?

quest.name: To a Deeper Place
quest.desc: $npcName:11004577$ says you can finally explore beyond $map:02020036$. What is beyond $map:02020036$? Hurry over to $map:02020036$ and find out.

quest.name: Optimal Scout
quest.desc: You were at a loss since everyone pointed at you as the optimal scout, but you decided to go beyond $map:02020036$ to live up to their expectation. $npcName:11004582$ asked you to investigate $map:02020066$ which was discovered during the initial exploration... Move out to investigate $map:02020066$ and defeat the interfering Kharon.

quest.name: New Place, New Encounter
quest.desc: $npcName:11004571$ was surprised that you came from beyond $map:02020036$, and was surprised again that you defeated the Kharon to come here. When you asked about this place, $npcName:11004571$ told you to go see their leader, $npcName:11004574$. However, he told you to not mention Humanitas to $npcName:11004574$. What is the reason for that? For now, go see $npcTitle:11004574$.

quest.name: Tightly Closed Mind
quest.desc: You tried to explain the situation by meeting the refugee leader, but $npcName:11004574$ expressed strong hostility after hearing the word Humanitas. $npcName:11004574$ asked what Humanitas did for them when the Daemon Army appeared and they couldn't move anywhere. You objected that Humanitas had difficulty fighting on two fronts, but $npcName:11004574$ didn't listen. This won't do. You need to help the refugees to turn around $npcName:11004574$'s mind.

quest.name: Leader's Recommendation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004574$ finally opened up. When you asked for details on this place, she tells you the existence of $npcTitle:11004576$ who knows all the rumors in this vicinity. She even wrote you a recommendation as if feeling sorry for everything that happened. Take the recommendation and go see $npcTitle:11004576$.

quest.name: Paying the Price
quest.desc: There was nothing $npcTitle:11004576$ didn't know! Just a brief conversation and $npcTitle:11004576$ knew you are looking for $npcName:11004430$, but he asked for something in return. $npc:11004576$ asked for an item instead of the information fee when you gave the puppy dog eyes. Bring $item:30001349$ that he wants.

quest.name: Information Dealer's Intuition
quest.desc: $npc:11004576$ said many materials are being transported to $map:02020067$ recently. His intuition says something is being built in $map:02020067$. Trust in his intuition and go to $map:02020067$ to check for anything suspicious.
quest.manual: Use the binoculars to check for anything suspicious in $map:02020067$

quest.name: New Place, Joyful Encounter
quest.desc: The facility looks very suspicious, but no action can be taken as the facts haven't been grasped yet. It would be great if there was more information... Go to $npcTitle:11004576$ for now and ask for other information.

quest.name: Importance of Information
quest.desc: $npcName:11004576$ said the facility is related to Tairen's newest weapon, Arkeon. $npcName:11004576$ said Arkeon has tremendous power and it will be dangerous if it falls into the hands of $npcName:11004430$. You are about to go when he suggests a great idea since it's impossible to go barehanded. $npcName:11004576$ said you will know how to control Arkeon if you go to $map:02020035$ and obtain the blueprint. Now go and obtain the blueprint.

quest.name: Learned Hacking Through Errands
quest.desc: You need to go inside the factory to obtain the blueprint, but the entrance is hidden. $npcName:11004580$ and $npcName:11004579$ said you need to hack in this situation... You should give it a try.

quest.name: Security System in Operation
quest.desc: The robot guide inside the factory said Arkeon's blueprint is further inside. However, the facility's security has to be shut down to proceed inside... Go in for now since you don't really have any methods.

quest.name: Clash! Arkeon
quest.desc: You met $npcName:11004584$ and handed the blueprint, but he was stubborn saying he didn't need it. You suggested going together to defeat Arkeon, but $npcName:11004584$ firmly refused. When you persuaded him that he doesn't know the place, he changed his mind and promised to go together. All that's left is to defeat Arkeon.

quest.name: Unidentified Energy Source
quest.desc: $npc:11004577$ found out that $npcName:11004430$ is commanding the Daemon Army from $map:02020071$ which is beyond $map:02020070$. But she is hesitant to go through the gateway towards $map:02020071$ as an unidentified energy source was detected there. You will need to see this energy source with your eyes for everyone's sake. $npcName:11004584$ wanted to go as well, but you asked $npcName:11004582$ to lead the way since he doesn't know much about Kritias yet. $npcName:11004582$ felt very grateful. Wonder why? You are curious, but you need to check out the energy source and teach the interfering monsters a lesson.

quest.name: Relic of the Past
quest.desc: You suddenly felt a great tremor while you were defeating the interfering enemies. What is this tremor?

quest.name: Side Effect of Learning
quest.desc: $npcName:11004582$ saw the photo taken in $map:02020070$ and said the unidentified energy source is $npcName:11004684$, a weapon that used to guard Tairen in the past. $npcName:11004582$ said it was a superior weapon that guarded the kingdom from the front, but it became sentient through repeated learning and was discarded by $npcName:11004575$. Listen carefully to what she is saying.

quest.name: Trusting You
quest.desc: $npcName:11004582$ said they would need to consider retreating, but you can't do that when you came this far. You will stop $npcName:11004684$ and enter $map:02020071$.

quest.name: Dignity of Royalty
quest.desc: $npcName:11004684$ always has a barrier protecting itself, but that barrier gets removed when before royalty. $npcName:11004582$ tells you to defeat $npcName:11004684$ with her, but $npcName:11004583$ is vehemently against it. $npcName:11004583$ said they should make an aetherine disruptor instead to trick $npcName:11004684$. The problem is there's no way to obtain $item:30001350$ which is a material to make the aetherine disruptor... $npcName:11004583$ said refugees who were recently expelled from Tairen might have $item:30001350$. Go see $npcName:11004574$ for now.

quest.name: Getting Material
quest.desc: $npcName:11004574$ said the refugees don't have that material, but the Tairen soldiers in $map:02020066$ might have $item:30001350$. While you obtain the material, teach those Tairen soldiers observing the refugees a lesson.

quest.name: Decisive Battle! Timaion
quest.desc: Now, all preparations are complete. Let's go and defeat $npcName:11004684$!

quest.name: Ambiguous Feeling
quest.desc: You finally arrived in $map:02020071$. The moment you decided to enter, you felt an ominous aura. What is the identity of this aura?

quest.name: Prepare to Charge!
quest.desc: The sudden appearance of $npcName:11004430$ made it chaotic, but $npcName:11004577$ said to focus on the important task and that is to apprehend $npcName:11004430$. $npcName:11004577$ suggested that should split into 2 routes to charge in. Thorough preparation must be made for this important battle.

quest.name: Moment to End the Ill-fated Relationship
quest.desc: All preparations are done. Now it's time to end the long ill-fated relationship with $npcName:11004430$.

quest.name: The Final Battle
quest.desc: There is nothing to fear when you are with everyone. The moment to defeat $npcName:11004430$ has come.

quest.name: Her Reason
quest.desc: The shocking truth that $npcName:11004430$ was a robot and the Tairen forces drawing near. It was a dangerous situation, but everyone was able to survive due to the dramatic appearance of $npcName:11004603$. What was $npcName:11004603$ doing after parting ways? Hear the details from her.

quest.name: Shocking Truth
quest.desc: $npcName:11004430$ was a clone made by $npcName:11004575$ to break the seal on Kritias. Everyone became silent at the shocking truth that $npcName:11004430$, one of the Seven Commanders of $npcName:11004613$ who troubled Maple World for a long time, was a robot and born in Kritias. But there is no time to gape. Although the situation is like this, there must be something that can be done.

quest.name: Marlene's Gift
quest.desc: $npcName:11004609$ prepared a small gift thanking you for the help in driving out the Daemon Army from this land. What could the gift be? Go and ask.

quest.name: Finally to Maple World
quest.desc: $npcName:11004609$'s gift was a letter proclaiming the amicable alliance between Humanitas and the Maple Alliance. $npcName:11004604$ says the letter should be delivered to Empress $npcName:11004390$. It's finally time to return to Maple World.

quest.name: A New Goal
quest.desc: Life in Kritias was very hard, but it was a precious time where you met $npcName:11004609$ and $npcName:11004603$. $npcName:11004390$ is proud of everyone. Now it's time to move forward with a new goal.

quest.name: Everything as Planned
quest.desc: How much does $npcName:11004613$ know about Kritias? Did he know $npcName:11004430$ was a robot? How will he react to $npcName:11004430$'s death? You're curious what $npcName:11004613$ is thinking right now.
